questions.question: What method was used to prepare ZnCe-MOF and CuCe-MOF?
What is the formula for the MOFs mentioned in the study?
What technique was used to improve the electrical conductivity of ZnCe-MOF and CuCe-MOF?
questions.answer: Electrodeposition method was used to in-situ coat polyaniline (PANI)

questions.question: What was the specific capacitance of CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 and ZnCe-MOF@PANI-1 electrodes at 1 A g−1?
questions.answer: CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 had a specific capacitance of 724.4F g−1 and ZnCe-MOF@PANI-1 had 713.2F g−1

questions.question: How does the electrochemical performance of CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 compare to ZnCe-MOF@PANI-1 in terms of energy density at a power density of 850 W kg−1?
questions.answer: CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 delivers an energy density of 87.45 Wh kg−1 and ZnCe-MOF@PANI-1 delivers 58.05 Wh kg−1

questions.question: What was the outcome of coating PANI on ZnCe-MOF and CuCe-MOF regarding their electrochemical performance?
questions.answer: Coating PANI on ZnCe-MOF and CuCe-MOF significantly improved their energy storage behaviors in supercapacitors

questions.question: What role does the 3D structure of MOFs play in their application as electrode materials?
questions.answer: The 3D structure of MOFs provides channels that are conducive to the electron and ion transfer in the electrochemical process

questions.question: Is the electrochemical performance of MOFs enhanced by the addition of conductive polymers?
questions.answer: Yes, the electrochemical performance of MOFs is enhanced by the addition of conductive polymers like PANI

questions.question: Did the study find that excessive conductive polymer can block the migration of electrons in the electrode material?
questions.answer: True, excessive conductive polymer can block the migration of electrons in the electrode material and deteriorate the electrochemical performance

questions.question: Can the assembled hybrid capacitor using CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 as positive material light up a LED indicator?
questions.answer: Yes, the assembled hybrid capacitor using CuCe-MOF@PANI-1 as positive material can light up a LED indicator
